user.about: Welcome to my UserStyles.org profile, alot of my styles are related to adblocking, some of my styles also include color theme options (usually just the color theme I have used but I am willing to add multi-choice if requested). Style Options Styles who's descriptions end with :: indicate that they have options which can be configured (this is a new pattern I am using to be able to quickly locate styles with or without options.
